packageDirectories.package: Lightweight - OAuth 2.0 JWT Client Credentials Auth Provider
packageDirectories.versionDescription: A lightweight generic Auth Provider Apex class that can be used with named/external credentials to get an access token using the OAuth 2.0 JWT Client Credentials Authentication Flow.

dependencies.package: Lightweight - Apex Unit Test Util v2@2.4.0-1

packageDirectories.package: Lightweight - OAuth 2.0 JWT Client Credentials Auth Provider - Demo Data
